title: Adam Lambert hopes his single will help 'empower' victims
text:
He knows what it's like to be different and dance to the beat of his own drum.

And now Adam Lambert hopes his new single Superpower helps others who sometimes feel like they don't quite fit in.

On Saturday, the 37-year-old told The Daily Telegraph: 'Everyone has had a moment where they've felt bullied or left out or discriminated against...

Scroll down for video

Modern-day hero: Singer Adam Lambert (pictured) hopes his new single will help 'empower' anyone who has ever been a victim of discrimination

'I wanted to write something that made them feel like they could stand up for themselves.

'I really wanted to write something that made them feel empowered,' the Whataya Want From Me singer added.

On Monday, during a phone interview on The Kyle and Jackie O Show, Kyle Sandilands asked Adam if he was The Wolf on Channel 10's ratings juggernaut, The Masked Singer.

'Jackie won't tell me who is under the masks, so will you? Are you the Wolf or any other of the masked singers?' quizzed the radio Titan.

On Monday, during a phone interview on The Kyle and Jackie O Show, Kyle Sandilands asked the Whataya Want From Me singer whether he was The Wolf on The Masked Singer

Adam replied in a theatrical tone: 'I don't know what you're talking about!'

Jackie 'O' Henderson offered a wry smile before bursting into laughter.

'You know what the show is right? You're aware of the show. It's going crazy all over the world. But you can't confirm or deny obviously,' Kyle added.

In response, Adam echoed his earlier answer.

King Kyle demanded answers! Are you the Wolf or any other of the masked singers?' Kyle asked Adam on The Kyle and Jackie O Show

Adam, who rose to fame on the U.S. talent show American Idol, has been performing with legendary band Queen since 2011.

He's set set to return to Australia with the band, which includes original members Brian May and Roger Taylor, in 2020.

Their first Australian show is scheduled in Brisbane on February 13.

The Masked Singer continues Monday at 7.30pm on Channel 10
